data.title: Carlos Neto - Certified IT Manager - Portugal, Aveiro, Pescanova Group, University of Aveiro
data.text:
Hello ... a little about.me,

High potential Certified IT Manager , specialist in Network Management and Design on Microsoft/ Linux operating systems environments, with an high array of skills and experiences.

Latest Projects:

Acuinova S.A. Pescanova Group ( Feb.2009 - Present ) IT Manager

Reporting directly to the Administrative and Financial Director, I am responsible for implementation and maintenance of all projects of Information Systems for the development of aquaculture, including:

• Project Management Implementation of a solution of structured network with Fiber Optic Backbone, which provides connection between all departments scattered over the complex of 42 hectares and 1820 tanks that make the largest enterprise of world production of Turbot in aquaculture.

• In conjunction with business partners to ensure the implementation of an infrastructure system, providing authentication services, directory and e-mail Exchange, also supporting the company's ERP System, SAPR3 Business Suite, integrated with the Application of Production and control stocks.

• Responsible for the implementation of Fortinet Security solutions, Cisco Network Voice and Data, IP telephony with Wireless coverage, IP Fax, CCTV and Video Conferencing, and also for ancillary systems of automation of the production areas.

• Besides the maintenance and Datacenter Server, I also am responsible for the installation of PC's and user support, develop further activities in coordination with external suppliers and internal teams on project development.

• Planning and implementation of a ITIL Support System for users (HelpDesk).

See more projects at my Personal page: http://netocarlo9.wix.com/carlosneto
